metadata.title: CVE-2019-16224 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in py-lmdb 0.97. For certain values of md_flags,mdb_node_add does not properly set up a memcpy destination, leading to aninvalid write operation. NOTE: this outcome occurs when accessing adata.mdb file supplied by an attacker.

criterions.comment: py-lmdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
